Question: Shenzhen Lifengda Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
TCL Electronics

CES 2024: TCL will showcase over a hundred cutting-edge products, including QD-Mini LED TVs, TCL FreshIN air conditioners, TCL Free Built-in Series refrigerators, washing machines, feature-rich mobile devices, AR glasses, and commercial displays. The company will introduce one of the industryâ€™s first smart connected mobile device entertainment solutions, as well as the latest NXTPAPER display technology and RayNeo AR glasses with revolutionary full-color 3D head-up display and powerful AI capabilities. TCL will also demonstrate its commitment to a greater and more sustainable future through its latest environmental, social, and governance (ESG) initiatives. The company has witnessed consistent growth throughout the first three quarters of 2023, with leading positions in various global markets for TVs, mobile devices, and other products.
